tool_description:
Convert video from YouTube to audio (mp3) or video (mp4) asynchronously.

REST API that allows you to convert a YouTube video to audio or video format.

The links are available for a maximum period of 12 hours, after which the link is no longer available.
name: YouTube to mp3
title: YouTube to mp3

api_list.name: downloadUsingPOST
api_list.description: Convert YouTube video to mp3 async
